alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:24PM CDT until September 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR HASKELL COUNTY... At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rochester, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Rule around 630 PM CDT. Sagerton around 635 PM CDT. Weinert around 640 PM CDT. Haskell around 645 PM CDT. Paint Creek around 700 PM CDT. Stamford, Lake Stamford Marina and Irby around 705 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Jud, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line and Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
